description: This file defines Express.js routes for a web API, including endpoints for authentication, employee management, skill factories, learning paths, assessments, metrics, instructions, and announcements. It also integrates middleware for authorization and role-based access control, and includes Swagger annotations for API documentation.

methods.name: GET /hello
methods.description: Returns a simple 'Hello World' message.

methods.name: POST /signup
methods.description: Handles user registration, creating a new user with provided username, password, and role.

methods.name: POST /login
methods.description: Handles user login, validating credentials and returning a JWT token.

methods.name: POST /employees
methods.description: Creates a new employee record.

methods.name: GET /employees
methods.description: Retrieves the list of all employee records.

methods.name: PUT /employees/:employeeId
methods.description: Replaces an employee record by employeeId; protected route requiring specific roles.

methods.name: PATCH /employees/:employeeId
methods.description: Partially updates an employee record; protected route.

methods.name: DELETE /employees/:employeeId
methods.description: Deletes an employee record; protected route.

methods.name: POST /skill-factories
methods.description: Creates a new skill factory record; protected route.

methods.name: GET /skill-factories
methods.description: Lists all skill factory records.

methods.name: GET /skill-factories/{skillFactoryId}
methods.description: Fetches a specific skill factory by ID.

methods.name: PUT /skill-factories/{skillFactoryId}
methods.description: Replaces a skill factory record; protected route.

methods.name: PATCH /skill-factories/{skillFactoryId}
methods.description: Partially updates a skill factory record; protected route.

methods.name: DELETE /skill-factories/{skillFactoryId}
methods.description: Deletes a skill factory record; protected route.

methods.name: POST /learningpaths
methods.description: Creates a new learning path; protected route.

methods.name: GET /learningpaths
methods.description: Lists all learning paths.

methods.name: PUT /learningpaths/{learningPathName}
methods.description: Replaces a learning path; protected route.

methods.name: PATCH /learningpaths/{learningPathName}
methods.description: Partially updates a learning path; protected route.

methods.name: DELETE /learningpaths/{learningPathName}
methods.description: Deletes a learning path; protected route.

methods.name: POST /assessments
methods.description: Creates a new assessment; protected route.

methods.name: GET /assessments
methods.description: Lists all assessments.

methods.name: GET /assessments/{assessmentId}
methods.description: Fetches a specific assessment by ID.

methods.name: PUT /assessments/{assessmentId}
methods.description: Replaces an assessment record; protected route.

methods.name: PATCH /assessments/{assessmentId}
methods.description: Partially updates an assessment; protected route.

methods.name: DELETE /assessments/{assessmentId}
methods.description: Deletes an assessment record; protected route.

methods.name: GET /metrics/summary
methods.description: Returns aggregated success metrics, including learning paths, skill factories, and employee billing counts.

methods.name: GET /metrics/learning-paths
methods.description: Provides metrics per learning path.

methods.name: GET /metrics/skill-factories
methods.description: Provides metrics per skill factory.

methods.name: POST /instructions
methods.description: Creates a new instruction; protected route.

methods.name: GET /instructions
methods.description: Lists all instructions.

methods.name: GET /instructions/{id}
methods.description: Fetches a specific instruction by ID.

methods.name: PUT /instructions/{id}
methods.description: Replaces an instruction; protected route.

methods.name: PATCH /instructions/{id}
methods.description: Partially updates an instruction; protected route.

methods.name: DELETE /instructions/{id}
methods.description: Deletes an instruction; protected route.

methods.name: GET /announcements
methods.description: Lists all announcements.

methods.name: POST /announcements
methods.description: Creates a new announcement; protected route.

methods.name: POST /announcements
methods.description: Creates a new announcement (protected, role-based).

methods.name: GET /announcements/:id
methods.description: Retrieves a specific announcement by ID.

methods.name: PUT /announcements/:id
methods.description: Replaces an existing announcement (protected, role-based).

methods.name: PATCH /announcements/:id
methods.description: Partially updates an announcement (protected, role-based).

methods.name: DELETE /announcements/:id
methods.description: Deletes an announcement (protected, role-based).
